text: If you are working on something exciting that you really care about, you don't have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
author: Steve Jobs

text: My attitude is that if you push me towards something that you think is a weakness, then I will turn that perceived weakness into a strength.
author: Michael Jordan

text: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.
author: Albert Einstein

text: It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

text: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
author: Julie Andrews

text: I don't focus on what I'm up against. I focus on my goals and I try to ignore the rest.
author: Venus Williams

text: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
author: Confucius

text: If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito.
author: Dalai Lama

text: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
author: Thomas Edison

text: Goals should never be easy. They should force you to work, even if they are uncomfortable at the time.
author: Michael Phelps

text: The great danger for most of us lies not in setting our aim too high and falling short, but in setting our aim too low, and achieving our mark.
author: Michelangelo

text: If something is wrong, fix it now. But train yourself not to worry, worry fixes nothing.
author: Ernest Hemingway
